Package Golf

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutForm
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Class: Shipping Hub File: AboutForm.java Description: About class provides an about screen for the Craps Simulation Program, that allows the user to find out more about the program.
    AddFormJDialog
    AddFormJDialog.java AddFormJDialog is called when the user selects to add a new golfer.
    BinarySearch
    BinarySearch.java BinarySearch can be used to search for golfer by first, and last names.
    Golfer
    Golfer.java Golfer class extends the Member class and add a rating parameter so that golfers can be rated numerically on their abilities.
    GolfGUI
    GolferGUI.java GolferGUI is the user interface for a database program that allows the user to save student golfers in a database that keeps track of their first, and last names, email address, phone number, and current ranking in the school.
    Member
    Member.java Member class is a parent of Golfer class for creating members of the golf club.
    PrintUtilities
    A simple utility class that lets you very simply print an arbitrary component.
    ReadFile
    ReadFile.java A class used to read cities from a text file with comma separated 5 fields per line: field1 : Name field2 : Population field3 : Median income field4 : Percent native field1 : Percent advanced degree
    SearchFormDialog
    SearchFormDialog.java SearchFormDialog class is used to search for an existing golfer in the database.
    Sort
    Sort.java Sort class is used to sort through the arrayList and display golfers either by last name, or ranking.
    Splash
    Splash
    Validation
    Class: Validation File: Validation.java Description: Validates entered values
    WriteFile
    WriteFile.java A class used to write members to a text file.
